title: Veigar Ult Laugh Missing Audio
body:
Hello,
After receiving a veigar skin from a mystery box, i began playing him for  quite a bit, but i felt like something was missing. After laning against one and being bursted to oblivion i realized that veigar doesn't laugh when his ult takes the finishing blow.

Severity: Low

Recreation: Kill (or be killed) by a veigar ultimate and listen closely

Proof: Here is a small video with the audio adjusted for hear the champion voices better. (Fraps was acting weird, so the part happens at the very end very quickly, notice the soraka death sounds but nothing else)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bOSIBRpSiRw  (sorry for bad quality)

-Potato Jesus

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! 

We'll take a look at it!

Hey there

Sounds like some files might be corrupted or missing. Be sure to run a repair by clicking the gear icon in the top-right corner of your launcher.
Alright will do and check again
Just did testing after repairing and still no laugh.
